albsavoia wrote:

> TITLE: Beyond JUnit: The Future of Developer Testing for JavaTM
> Technology

Just some feedback: I'm not a big fan of the way your company is using 
the term "developer testing". It sounds too much like Programmer 
Testing, which is already a well-known term in the Agile community, and 
which includes more than just unit testing. (What's a "unit" anyway?) 
There are already too many terms that mean similar things. We don't need 
more of them! (I wish we had fewer of them!)

Still, I am intrigued by the work Agitar is doing. I would be interested 
in evaluating Agitator on a future project, and I would write about my 
experiences.
--
